channel.title: Jenkins X on SuRenPi
channel.description: Recent content in Jenkins X on SuRenPi

item.title: Install
item.description: 安装 Git yum install git -y 拉取 Docker 镜像 docker pull registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/surenpi/tiller:v2.9.1 && docker tag registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/surenpi/tiller:v2.9.1 gcr.io/kubernetes-helm/tiller:v2.9.1 获取 jx curl -L https://github.com/jenkins-x/jx/releases/download/v1.3.8/jx-linux-amd64.tar.gz | tar xzv mv jx /usr/local/bin 安装 jx jx install --username suren --provider kubernetes

item.title: Jenkins X
item.description: 添加 Gitee 为 Git 服务器 jx create git server gitea http://localhost:10080
